Description: Cup (posset), made of lustreware pottery (blue); Persian inscription.
Bibliographic references: Hobson 1932b / A Guide to the Islamic Pottery of the Near East (fig.80)
Lane 1957 / Later Islamic Pottery: Persia, Syria, Egypt, Turkey (fig.85.B)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1996 11 Jul-6 Oct, Japan, Arita, Kyushu Ceramic Museum, Ceramics and Civilisation
Acquisition name: Donated by: Sir Augustus Wollaston Franks
